snippet: Among the stars of the network’s new comedies are Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher. Other new entries include an animated show, a reality show and an “event series.”
lead_paragraph: Among the stars of the network’s new comedies are Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher. Other new entries include an animated show, a reality show and an “event series.”

headline.main: Fox Looks to Shore Up Comedy Lineup on Tuesdays
headline.print_headline: Fox Looks to Shore Up Comedy Lineup on Tuesdays
